content: Dec 8 The following are the top stories in the Financial Times. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
name: Omnicom Group Inc

content: SAO PAULO Omnicom Group Inc  the world's second largest advertising company  has agreed to pay 1 billion reais ($270 million) for Brazil's Grupo ABC  growing Omnicom's publicity  branding services and content in Latin America's largest economy  a source with direct knowledge of the transaction said on Friday.

title: Omnicom to buy Brazil advertising group ABC  source says
